GSD.description:
cifs: fix potential double free during failed mount

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit ce0008a0e410cdd95f0d8cd81b2902ec10a660c4. For more details please see the references link.
